azurerm_hpc_cache_blob_target.description: Manages a Blob Target within a HPC Cache.

cache_name.description: The name HPC Cache, which the HPC Cache Blob Target will be added to. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

name.description: The name of the HPC Cache Blob Target. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group in which to create the HPC Cache Blob Target. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

namespace_path.description: The client-facing file path of the HPC Cache Blob Target.

storage_container_id.description: The Resource Manager ID of the Storage Container used as the HPC Cache Blob Target. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
